name: Jabril Got My Back
description:
Controls

WASD to move

Space or Mouse Click to Shoot.  While shooting you create a mirror clone that moves opposite you and shoots.  You will lock your facing when shooting.

Description

As you shoot the ability to shoot gets worse.  You can't shoot as often and you projectiles go more slowly.  Eventually you'll have to lure enemies into your projectiles.

You need to defeat the swarms of enemies!  

Once you defeat a wave, loot drops!  You can get five different kinds of loot and upgrade more and more.  Once you get to the end and die all your upgrades are lost.  

You can submit your score to the leaderboard!

Source on GitHub: https://github.com/dgeisert/IGotMyBack/tree/jabril
